bibl.title: The Poll Tax of Sergius of Nessana.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: EL-ABBADI, Mostafa

bibl.note: P. Nes. 59 is a tax receipt which concerns a resident of Nessana by the name of Sergius. The early date (A.D. 684 = A.H. 65) places the document within less than half a century of Arab rule in Palestine.
EL-ABBADI Mostafa, The Poll Tax of Sergius of Nessana.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 470-473.
